de.dviererbe.healthtrack.persistence

Class SharedPreferenceRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.dviererbe.healthtrack.persistence.SharedPreferenceRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPreferredThemeRepository, IPreferredUnitRepository, IWidgetConfigurationRepository

    public class SharedPreferenceRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPreferredThemeRepository, IPreferredUnitRepository, IWidgetConfigurationRepository
    Uses the application shared preferences as a storage mechanism.
